title: Need rewards for reaching certain mastery exp!
body:
So, I've played league for over 4 years, and since the new mastery update I've played a little more than what is healthy for me.
I know many friends with 100k exp on champions.
And we all agree that there needs to be rewards for reaching certain points.
eg. achieving 100k exp grants you a silver cloth mastery (instead of the red) and a different shape mastery badge.
500k get an emblem of the champion you got 500k with. and things like that.
just a small thought, id like to know your guys opinions!

replies.body: There will be a champion mastery Level 6/7, when rito stop being lazy and release it.
Yeah, the Level 6/7 mastery would be cool, but only make it appear on your top 3 champs, so if the 4th one gets more points than your 3rd, it will drop down back to level 5 mastery
